title: [K-12] Design of Online Discussion-Based Science Teacher Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science curriculum content and instructional methodologies
context.additional_context: Asynchronous discussion environments using digital devices, centered on science subject project-based learning.

learning_goals: Learners can independently design online discussion topics by applying the instructional design framework (CoI model).
Learners can deepen discussion content through peer feedback and clearly explain scientific concepts.
Learners can systematically apply student engagement strategies when designing science lessons through discussion-based project outcomes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
